# `eth_signTransaction`

## call
```
{
	"jsonrpc":"2.0",
	"method":"eth_signTransaction",
	"params":[{
        "from": "0x8a10140062e3cab46ccf07604e583b237467f696",
        "to": "0x8a10140062e3cab46ccf07604e583b237467f999",
        "gas": "0x7000",
        "gasPrice": "0x1000",
        "data": "0x006000",
        "value":"0xff",
        "nonce": "0x0"
    }],
	"id":1
}
```
---
## Return
```
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": {
        "raw": "0xf86780821000827000948a10140062e3cab46ccf07604e583b237467f99981ff83006000820a96a09e5bd3a616ab028a206f959921d6db4826be51c4c55b5f2a1b15aeb74aa6960ca078ad44dbd769c5f3493bf9b94005c5ec1366e59114bb19e5e5f697fa21c36921",
        "tx": {
            "type": "0x0",
            "nonce": "0x0",
            "gasPrice": "0x1000",
            "maxPriorityFeePerGas": null,
            "maxFeePerGas": null,
            "gas": "0x7000",
            "value": "0xff",
            "input": "0x006000",
            "v": "0xa96",
            "r": "0x9e5bd3a616ab028a206f959921d6db4826be51c4c55b5f2a1b15aeb74aa6960c",
            "s": "0x78ad44dbd769c5f3493bf9b94005c5ec1366e59114bb19e5e5f697fa21c36921",
            "to": "0x8a10140062e3cab46ccf07604e583b237467f999",
            "hash": "0x848b59b16c0a574066adcaf1fec64417f8d408215161581d3faae83448a1adac"
        }
    }
}
```
---
## geth --http --dev
version 1.10.4-stable

Go versoion go1.16.4

OS Windows
#|Test |Params | Result|Notes|
:---|---|:---:|:---:| ---
0.0 | does it work with just from| frpm | error -32000| no it does not |
0.1 | does it work with just to and from and to | to / from and to | -3200 | gas not specified|
0.2 | does it work with just gas| gas | error  -32000| no |
0.3 | does it work with just data| | | no, you need to have data and or a to address plus everything else|
0.4 | does it work with just value|| |you need to and or data plus gas, gasPrice, from, and nonce to make it work so value is practically the only optional item... odd|
0.5| does it work with just any from address or only your own| everything but different from address | error -32000| only your address |
0.6| does it work with any data | see table 1 | 
0.7| does it work with any value? | dev version has practically unlimited eth so hard to test|
0.8| does it work | situation shown on top| shown on top| not the same as wiki|
0.9| how does it nonce value work| see table 2| 
0.10| same as 0.8 but with nonce of 1 | above| 0xf86701821000827000948a10140062e3cab46ccf07604e583b237467f99981ff83006000820a95a0a67044e0694eb9bd1d1daa7f84becd95e2a6997b66c59e3d01d6535c372f7c40a063a8b24c468b06e932438a227ebb9120f727ad2efece7f1bcd07708e5ccdc589 | different result|
0.11| | | | makes you input a gas price just to ignore it, probably a london thing|

2.3| nonce of fffffff| 0xffffff|0xf86384ffffffff8080948a10140062e3cab46ccf07604e583b237467f6002080820a96a00b05dfc59c7254507ed2e8c586de32a5a2de0f26b6f08ab3a0c02fb51e29e823a065a85fa4f9074dc877f7662b00efc43afeb61f65efec52574cd074967207a530| will test these in sendRaw transaction

it just changes the nonce on the transaction, I will chech to see the nonce on the actual transactuion

Looks like it will convert any valid(from a syntax standpoint) transaction, but they shouldnt all run
